Posts.Content: I am stage 4 breast cancer with metastasis to the hip and I am doing everything natural.  So far, since diagnosis in 12/14, my markers have gone down.  You shoud tell her to visit www.chrisbeatcancer.com and look up Ty Bollinger also.  Chris is a young man who had cancer and cured it with diet and Ty lost 3 people in his family and has devoted himself to research and speaking with experts in the natural field.  There are so many testmonies from people in stage 4 sent home to die by their oncologists and they are alive today.  I've done nothing but educate myself and change my entire diet.  I feel amazing!  It has been hard work but my life is worth it.  I hope you help her with this and give her these websites.  It is AMAZING what we aren't told.
